    • Constructor Detail

      • Partition

        public Partition(int n,
                 int m,
                 boolean shuffling)
        Creates a partition on n natural numbers [0,n)
        Parameters:
        n - Size of the set being partitioned
        m - Number of groups defining the partition
        shuffling - If the set of integers should be shuffled before partitioning it or not

      • Partition

        public Partition(int[] idx,
                 int m)
        Constructor: Creates a partition of a randomized set in m random groups
        Parameters:
        index1 - Randomized Set. The data set already permuted
        m - Number of groups

        groupsSize - Size of groups
